string.name: JUNK_BREAKARMOR_35_DESC

string.name: JUNK_BREAKARMOR_40_DESC
string.body: An old and worn suit of armour. Its useful days are long gone.

string.name: JUNK_BREAKARMOR_45_DESC
string.body: A large suit of battered armour. You can forget about wearing it with the state it's in.

string.name: JUNK_BREAKSWORD_35_DESC

string.name: JUNK_BREAKSWORD_40_DESC
string.body: A broken sword blade. Trying to use it as a weapon is pointless.

string.name: JUNK_BREAKSWORD_45_DESC
string.body: The hilt of a broken sword. Without the blade, what's the point of wielding it?

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_POTION_HP_MP_40A_DESC
string.body: It is a snack greatly loved by the Pumpkin King. Gather ten and give them as a present. \nA candy good for restoring energy, it restores [%e1.ProcHeal_Instant.Heal] HP and [%e2.ProcMpHeal_Instant.Heal] MP instantly.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_FOOD_HALLOWEEN_3STATS_DESC

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_HALLOWEEN_XPBOOST_01_DESC
string.body: While the Pumpkin King's Blessing is active, you gain 20%% additional XP from hunting, gathering, and crafting. \nThe effect lasts 1 hour, and the cooldown time is 9 hours.

string.name: STR_SCROLL_ITEM_UNSEAL_SPECIAL_TEST_01_DESC

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_WINTER_FOOD_CANDY_01_DESC
string.body: You transform into a polar bear for 60 minutes. Along with your own skills, your [%e2.StatUp.StatName] and [%e2.StatUp.StatName2] increase by [%e2.StatUp.Value] and [%e2.StatUp.Value2] points, and your [%e3.StatUp.StatName] and [%e3.StatUp.StatName2] increase by [%e3.StatUp.Value]%% and [%e3.StatUp.Value2]%%.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_FOOD_NEWYEAR_3STATS_DESC
string.body: Bring them to Namor in Sanctum and Nepor in Pandaemonium who are collecting food for the New Year festival.\nEating it increases your [%e1.StatUp.StatName] by [%e1.StatUp.Value], [%e2.StatUp.StatName] by [%e2.StatUp.Value], and [%e3.StatUp.StatName] by [%e3.StatUp.Value] for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_NEWYEAR_POTION_HP_MP_40A_DESC
string.body: Bring them to Namor in Sanctum and Nepor in Pandaemonium who are collecting food for the New Year festival.\nEating it restores [%e1.ProcHeal_Instant.Heal] HP and [%e2.ProcMpHeal_Instant.Heal] MP instantly.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_NEWYEAR_FOOD_DPHEAL_30A_DESC
string.body: Bring them to Namor in Sanctum and Nepor in Pandaemonium who are collecting food for the New Year festival.\nDrinking it restores 1000 DP instantly.

string.name: STR_QUEST_XPDRBOOST_LIGHT_20_DESC
string.body: You gain 20%% additional XP from hunting, gathering, and crafting, and the item drop rate increases by 5%%.\nThis effect expires after 1 hour, and you cannot use it again for 10 hours.

string.name: STR_ITEM_LIGHT_TITLE72_3_DESC
string.body: Allows the use of the <Sage Counsel> title.\nIncreases your Crit Strike by 4 points and Crit Spell by 2 points for 3 days.

string.name: STR_ITEM_LIGHT_TITLE73_7_DESC
string.body: Allows the use of the <Kind Counsel> title.\nIncreases your Crit Strike by 8 points, and Crit Spell by 4 points for 7 days.

string.name: STR_ITEM_LIGHT_TITLE74_DESC
string.body: Allows the use of the <Key Master> title.\nIncreases your Crit Strike by 8 points, Crit Spell by 4 points and Movement speed by 5%%.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_LUNAR_SCROLL_SHIELD_ALL_20A_DESC
string.body: Oh dear. You've attracted the attention of Dragon Lord Beritra. Things are bound to be difficult this year, unless you can get rid of this card somehow.\nReading this fortune will allow you to absorb up to [%e1.Shield.CoverValue] damage per physical attack, up to a total of [%e1.Shield.CoverValue] damage, for [%e1.Shield.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_LUNAR_SCROLL_SHIELD_ALL_30A_DESC
string.body: The Lord Israphel has his eye on you. He's a decent patron to have, but perhaps you could do better?\nReading this fortune will allow you to absorb up to [%e1.Shield.CoverValue] damage per physical attack, up to a total of [%e1.Shield.CoverValue] damage, for [%e1.Shield.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_LUNAR_SCROLL_SHIELD_ALL_40A_DESC
string.body: The Lady Siel watches over you.\nReading this scroll will allow you to absorb up to [%e1.Shield.CoverValue] damage per physical attack, up to a total of [%e1.Shield.CoverValue] damage, for [%e1.Shield.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_LUNAR_SCROLL_SHIELD_ALL_50A_DESC
string.body: Aion himself has bestowed his grace on you for the coming year.\nReading this fortune will allow you to absorb up to [%e1.Shield.CoverValue] damage per physical attack, up to a total of [%e1.Shield.CoverValue] damage, for [%e1.Shield.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_LUNAR_01_DESC
string.body: A card given to you by the Fayrefolk. What will your fortune hold?\nDouble-click to receive a random item.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_MATTER_PROC_POISON_FX_40A_DESC
string.body: Imbues a weapon with an effect that inflicts 10 points of poisoning damage on the target every 2 seconds for 20 seconds with 10%% probability.\nA Godstone Socketer can equip it on your weapon.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_MATTER_PROC_BLEED_FX_40A_DESC
string.body: Imbues a weapon with an effect that inflicts 14 points of bleeding damage to the target every 2 seconds for 10 seconds with 10%% probability.\nA Godstone Socketer can equip it on your weapon.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_MATTER_PROC_FIRE_DAMAGE_FX_40A_DESC
string.body: Imbues a weapon with an effect that inflicts 24 points of fire damage with 20%% probability.\nA Godstone Socketer can equip it on your weapon..

string.body: Inflicts 188 points of earth damage with 5% probability.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_ADD_TITLE_152_14_DESC
string.body: Enables you to use the 'Charmer' title for 14 days.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_ADD_TITLE_153_14_DESC
string.body: Enables you to use the <Sucker> title for 14 days.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_LUNAR_02_DESC
string.body: A package which you received in exchanged for the Charm Card Israphels Glory.\nDouble-click to receive a random item.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_LUNAR_03_DESC
string.body: A package which you received in exchanged for the Charm Card Siels Gift.\nDouble-click to receive a random item.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_LUNAR_04_DESC
string.body: A package which you received in exchanged for the Charm Card Aions Grace.\nDouble-click to receive a random item.

string.name: STR_DRBOOST_LIGHT_01_DESC
string.body: The chance of obtaining items from hunting creatures increases by 20%% while the charm remains active. \nThis effect expires after 30 minutes, and you cannot use it again for 1 hour.

string.name: STR_DRBOOST_DARK_01_DESC
string.body: The chance of obtaining items from hunting creatures increases by 20%% while the charm remains active. \nThis effect expires after 30 minutes, and you cannot use it again for 1 hour.

string.name: STR_MENTOR_SCROLL_XP_DROP_BOOST_DESC
string.body: You gain 20%% additional XP from hunting, gathering, and crafting while this effect is active.

string.name: STR_SL_mentor_scroll_drop_boost_DESC
string.body: The chance of obtaining items from hunting creatures increases by 5%% while this effect lasts.

string.name: STR_MENTOR_SCROLL_DROP_BOOST_DESC
string.body: The chance of obtaining items from hunting creatures increases by 20%% while this effect lasts.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_2HSWORD_D_N_U1_35B_DESC
string.body: This greatsword's structural integrity seems questionable. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_2HSWORD_N_C1_18A_DESC
string.body: If you can drag this club off the ground, it might make a worthy weapon. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_2HSWORD_N_E1_50A_DESC
string.body: This greatsword is surprisingly elegant. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_2HSWORD_N_L1_A_25A_DESC
string.body: The skill of the craftsman who made this greatsword is obvious. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_2HSWORD_N_U1_44A_DESC
string.body: This greatsword does not seem too happy about its situation. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_BOOK_D_N_U1_35B_DESC
string.body: There doesn't seem to be anything wrong with this tome. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_BOOK_N_E1_50A_DESC
string.body: This tome is functional, though it will be difficult to fit on your bookshelf. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_BOOK_N_L1_A_25A_DESC
string.body: A tome that for some reason is severely crumpled and tattered, and is available only on April Fool's Day.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_BOOK_N_U1_44A_DESC
string.body: This tome seems perfectly usable, if you don't mind strange looks. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_BOW_D_N_U1_35B_DESC
string.body: Pray to Aion you don't trip and fall on this spiky bow. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_BOW_N_E1_50A_DESC
string.body: Don't you love seeing your enemies bristle with your arrows? Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_BOW_N_L1_A_25A_DESC
string.body: Can't wait to show off all your new bowstrings? This is the weapon for you! Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_BOW_N_U1_44A_DESC
string.body: This leafy bow is made from wood that's still green. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_DAGGER_D_N_U1_35B_DESC
string.body: This blade is wickedly serrated. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_DAGGER_N_E1_50A_DESC
string.body: This dagger looks normal enough. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_DAGGER_N_L1_A_25A_DESC
string.body: Instead of poison, coat your dagger in economical rust! Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_DAGGER_N_U1_44A_DESC
string.body: This sleek little dagger looks like it's sprouting. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_MACE_D_N_U1_35B_DESC
string.body: Now you can bash skulls with another skull! Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_MACE_N_C1_18A_DESC
string.body: The most interesting warhammer you've ever seen. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_MACE_N_E1_50A_DESC
string.body: This warhammer will certainly make people forget about that one incident with the Ribbit. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_MACE_N_L1_A_25A_DESC
string.body: Inspire strong reactions with this unique warhammer. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_MACE_N_U1_44A_DESC
string.body: This warhammer proves you can make anything into a weapon. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_ORB_D_N_U1_35B_DESC
string.body: This eerie jewel grimaces at your foes. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_ORB_N_E1_50A_DESC
string.body: If you count this orb's tiny winged monster amongst your friends... you'll have a friend! Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_ORB_N_L1_A_25A_DESC
string.body: A jewel with an artistic crackling pattern. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_ORB_N_U1_44A_DESC
string.body: Be careful to keep this jewel out of the reach of hungry Elrocos. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_POLEARM_D_N_U1_35B_DESC
string.body: You can now live your dream of using a Jotun's stern face as a weapon. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_POLEARM_N_E1_50A_DESC
string.body: This spear's wicked blade is sure to impress your friends. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_POLEARM_N_L1_A_25A_DESC
string.body: This spear has not one, but three balance points! Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_POLEARM_N_U1_44A_DESC
string.body: A spear is a spear is a spear. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_STAFF_D_N_U1_35B_DESC
string.body: This staff is so elaborate it's likely to dazzle your enemies. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_STAFF_N_C1_18A_DESC
string.body: This staff's power is evident to anyone who sees it. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_STAFF_N_E1_50A_DESC
string.body: This staff is nice to look at, though complicated to swing. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_STAFF_N_L1_A_25A_DESC
string.body: A fine staff for Daevas who love a challenge! Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_STAFF_N_U1_44A_DESC
string.body: Sure, why not use this staff? Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_SWORD_N_C1_18A_DESC
string.body: This sword's maker is a master...at something. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_SWORD_N_E1_50A_DESC
string.body: This sword might finally make your mother proud of you. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_SWORD_N_L1_A_25A_DESC
string.body: A sword that tells the world you aren't compensating for anything. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_SWORD_N_U1_44A_DESC
string.body: There's no reason this sword shouldn't work just fine. Available Fool's Day only.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_FOOLSDAY_01_DESC

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_FOOLSDAY_02_DESC
string.body: Double-click this Nochsana Camp Treasure Chest to see what invincible weapon it contains.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_FOOLSDAY_03_DESC

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_FOOLSDAY_04_DESC
string.body: Double-click this Steel Rake Treasure Chest to see what mighty weapon it contains.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_FOOLSDAY_05_DESC
string.body: Double-click this Dark Poeta Treasure Chest to see what legendary weapon it contains.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_HEAD_DEVADAY_01_30DAY_DESC

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_HEAD_DEVADAY_02_DESC
string.body: A pointy hat received as a gift to celebrate Daeva's Day.

string.name: STR_WORLD_CASH_EXTEND_WAREHOUSE_02_DESC
string.body: This card expands your cube, giving you the first or the second additional row. You can only use a maximum of two of these items per character.

string.name: STR_WORLD_CASH_COUPON_CUSTOMIZE_02_DESC
string.body: You can change your face and physique.\nElyos can change their appearance by visiting Maenia in the Angelic Frippery shop in Sanctum. Asmodians need to visit Himingleva in the Angelic Frippery shop in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_WRAP_TEST_DYE_02_DESC
string.body: A test item to check whether the termed property works correctly when a disassemble item is made to be used infinitely.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_DEVA_FOOD_CAKE_01_DESC
string.body: A piece of Daeva's Day Cake.\nEating it increases [%e1.StatUp.StatName] by [%e1.StatUp.Value], [%e2.StatUp.StatName] by [%e2.StatUp.Value], [%e3.StatUp.StatName] by [%e3.StatUp.Value]%%, and [%e4.StatUp.StatName] by [%e4.StatUp.Value]%% for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_CASH_MS_TORSO_WEDDINGDRESS_03A_DESC
string.body: A ceremonial dress for the wedding.\nPut it in the Jacket slot to wear it.

string.name: STR_CASH_MS_TORSO_SWIMSUIT_01B_DESC
string.body: A cute and charming little swimsuit.

string.name: STR_CASH_MS_TORSO_SWIMSUIT_03B_DESC
string.body: A hot swimsuit for a hot day at the hotsprings, or wherever you want the hotness.

string.name: STR_CASH_MS_TORSO_WONDERGIRLS_01B_DESC
string.body: A hot denim one-piece dress worn by Sunye and Lim at the Wonder Girls' '2DT' dance exhibition.

string.name: STR_CASH_MS_TORSO_WONDERGIRLS_02B_DESC
string.body: A vivacious denim one-piece dress worn by Yeeun at the Wonder Girls' '2DT' dance exhibition.

string.name: STR_CASH_MS_TORSO_WONDERGIRLS_03B_DESC
string.body: A cute denim one-piece dress worn by Sohee and Yoobin at the Wonder Girls' '2DT' dance exhibition.

string.name: STR_CASH_MS_TORSO_WONDERGIRLS_04B_DESC
string.body: A cute shirt and frilly skirt worn by the Wonder Girls during their 'Tell Me' dance.

string.name: STR_CASH_MS_TORSO_WONDERGIRLS_05B_DESC

string.name: STR_CASH_MS_TORSO_WONDERGIRLS_06B_DESC

string.name: STR_CASH_HEAD_HELMFIRE_01B_DESC

string.name: STR_CASH_KISK_LIGHT_PARTY_SMALL_SPECIAL_02_DESC
string.body: Summons a Kisk which resurrects the fallen at its location. It lasts for 2 hours and can be activated by up to 6 Alliance members.\nOnly usable by members of the same group as the summoner.

string.name: STR_CASH_ADD_CUSTOMIZE_MOTION_HOVERING_01_DESC
string.body: Changes idle, run, jump, and rest to hovering motions.\nYou can use each motion for 30 days.

string.name: STR_CASH_ITEM_START_KIT_DESC

string.name: STR_EVENT_FOOD_L_SHUGO_02_DESC
string.body: For 60 minutes, you transform into a Jumpy Monk who can use skills. Meanwhile, your [%e2.StatUp.StatName] increases by [%e2.StatUp.Value], your [%e2.StatUp.StatName2] increases by [%e2.StatUp.Value2] points, your [%e3.StatUp.StatName] increases by [%e3.StatUp.Value]%%, and your [%e3.StatUp.StatName2] increases by [%e3.StatUp.Value2]%%.

string.name: STR_EVENT_FOOD_D_SHUGO_02_DESC
string.body: For 60 minutes, you transform into a Jumpy Monk who can use skills. Meanwhile, your [%e2.StatUp.StatName] increases by [%e2.StatUp.Value], your [%e2.StatUp.StatName2] increases by [%e2.StatUp.Value2] points, your [%e3.StatUp.StatName] increases by [%e3.StatUp.Value]%%, and your [%e3.StatUp.StatName2] increases by [%e3.StatUp.Value2]%%.

string.name: STR_CASH_FOOD_L_SHUGO_02_DESC
string.body: You turn into a Shugo celebrating Halloween for 60 minutes. Increases [%e2.StatUp.StatName] by [%e2.StatUp.Value], [%e2.StatUp.StatName2] by [%e2.StatUp.Value2], [%e3.StatUp.StatName] by [%e3.StatUp.Value]%%, and [%e3.StatUp.StatName2] by [%e3.StatUp.Value2]%%.

string.name: STR_EVENT_FOOD_L_WHITE_TIGER_02_DESC
string.body: You transform into a Valiant Tiger that can use skills for 60 minutes. Meanwhile, your [%e2.StatUp.StatName] and [%e2.StatUp.StatName2] increase by [%e2.StatUp.Value] and [%e2.StatUp.Value2] points respectively, and your [%e3.StatUp.StatName] and [%e3.StatUp.StatName2] increase by [%e3.StatUp.Value]%% and [%e3.StatUp.Value2]%% respectively.

string.name: STR_WORLD_CASH_XPBOOST_01_DESC
string.body: You gain 30%% additional XP from hunting, gathering, and crafting while Demro's Amulet is active. \nThis effect expires after 1 hour, and you cannot use it again for 10 hours.

string.name: STR_WORLD_CASH_XPBOOST_02_DESC
string.body: You gain 20%% additional XP from hunting, gathering, and crafting while Virdi's Amulet is active. \nThis effect expires after 3 hours, and you cannot use it again for 10 hours.

string.name: STR_CASH_FOOD_L_SNOWBEAR_02_DESC
string.body: You transform into a polar bear that can use skills for 60 minutes. Meanwhile, your [%e2.StatUp.StatName] increases by [%e2.StatUp.Value], your [%e2.StatUp.StatName2] increases by [%e2.StatUp.Value2] points, your [%e3.StatUp.StatName] increases by [%e3.StatUp.Value]%%, and your [%e3.StatUp.StatName2] increases by [%e3.StatUp.Value2]%%.

string.name: STR_CASH_FOOD_D_SNOWBEAR_02_DESC
string.body: You transform into a polar bear that can use skills for 60 minutes. Meanwhile, your [%e2.StatUp.StatName] increases by [%e2.StatUp.Value], your [%e2.StatUp.StatName2] increases by [%e2.StatUp.Value2] points, your [%e3.StatUp.StatName] increases by [%e3.StatUp.Value]%%, and your [%e3.StatUp.StatName2] increases by [%e3.StatUp.Value2]%%.

string.name: STR_CASH_FOOD_L_PENGUIN_02_DESC
string.body: You transform into a Inquin that can use skills for 60 minutes. Meanwhile, your [%e2.StatUp.StatName] increases by [%e2.StatUp.Value], your [%e2.StatUp.StatName2] increases by [%e2.StatUp.Value2] points, your [%e3.StatUp.StatName] increases by [%e3.StatUp.Value]%%, and your [%e3.StatUp.StatName2] increases by [%e3.StatUp.Value2]%%.

string.name: STR_CASH_FOOD_D_PENGUIN_02_DESC
string.body: You transform into a Inquin that can use skills for 60 minutes. Meanwhile, your [%e2.StatUp.StatName] increases by [%e2.StatUp.Value], your [%e2.StatUp.StatName2] increases by [%e2.StatUp.Value2] points, your [%e3.StatUp.StatName] increases by [%e3.StatUp.Value]%%, and your [%e3.StatUp.StatName2] increases by [%e3.StatUp.Value2]%%.

string.name: STR_CASH_FOOD_L_PINK_TIGER_02_DESC
string.body: You transform into a pink tiger that can use skills for 60 minutes. Your [%e2.StatUp.StatName] and [%e2.StatUp.StatName2] increase by [%e2.StatUp.Value] and [%e2.StatUp.Value2] points respectively, and your [%e3.StatUp.StatName] and [%e3.StatUp.StatName2] increase by [%e3.StatUp.Value]%% and [%e3.StatUp.Value2]%% respectively.

string.name: STR_CASH_FOOD_D_PINK_TIGER_02_DESC
string.body: You transform into a pink tiger that can use skills for 60 minutes. Your [%e2.StatUp.StatName] and [%e2.StatUp.StatName2] increase by [%e2.StatUp.Value] and [%e2.StatUp.Value2] points respectively, and your [%e3.StatUp.StatName] and [%e3.StatUp.StatName2] increase by [%e3.StatUp.Value]%% and [%e3.StatUp.Value2]%% respectively.

string.name: STR_CASH_SWORD_CHAGESKIN_02A_DESC
string.body: A longsword shaped like a sugary lolly.\nUsed to modify a weapons appearance. Can be obtained from the Equipment Appearance Modifier in Sanctum and Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_CASH_DAGGER_CHAGESKIN_02A_DESC

string.name: STR_CASH_ORB_CHAGESKIN_02A_DESC

string.name: STR_CASH_BOOK_CHAGESKIN_02A_DESC

string.name: STR_CASH_2HSWORD_CHAGESKIN_02A_DESC

string.name: STR_CASH_POLEARM_CHAGESKIN_02A_DESC

string.name: STR_CASH_STAFF_CHAGESKIN_02A_DESC

string.name: STR_CASH_BOW_CHAGESKIN_02A_DESC

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_HALLOWEEN2011_DESC
string.body: A yearbook with school pictures of Blair and Witchta, two witches who are embarrassed about their teenage appearance. Won't they be thrilled to see this?\nOpen the album to absorb a maximum of [%e1.Shield.CoverValue] damage per physical attack you receive for [%e1.Shield.RemainTime].

string.body: You gain 20%% additional XP from hunting, gathering, and crafting while the Witch's Night is active. \nThis effect expires after 1 hour, and you cannot use it again for 10 hours.

string.name: STR_SCROLL_L_SPEED_ATK_50A
string.body: Courage in the Face of Danger Scroll

string.name: STR_SCROLL_D_SPEED_ATK_50A
string.body: Courage in the Face of Danger Scroll

string.name: STR_SCROLL_RETURN_ARENA_L_LOBBY_DESC
string.body: Takes you to the Kaisinel Academy.

string.name: STR_SCROLL_RETURN_ARENA_D_LOBBY_DESC
string.body: Takes you to the Marchutan Priory.

string.name: STR_SCROLL_L_SPEED_ATK_50A_DESC
string.body: [%e1.StatUp.StatName] becomes faster by [%e1.StatUp.Value]%% for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime]. Cannot be used together with the Awakening Scroll.\nYou can only use it in the Empyrean Crucible.

string.name: STR_SCROLL_D_SPEED_ATK_50A_DESC
string.body: [%e1.StatUp.StatName] becomes faster by [%e1.StatUp.Value]%% for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime]. Cannot be used together with the Awakening Scroll.\nYou can only use it in the Empyrean Crucible.

string.name: STR_SCROLL_L_SPEED_RUN_50A_DESC
string.body: [%e1.StatUp.StatName] becomes quicker by [%e1.StatUp.Value]%% for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime].\nYou can use it only in the Empyrean Crucible.

string.name: STR_SCROLL_D_SPEED_RUN_50A_DESC
string.body: [%e1.StatUp.StatName] becomes quicker by [%e1.StatUp.Value]%% for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime].\nYou can use it only in the Empyrean Crucible.

string.name: STR_SCROLL_L_SPEED_CASTING_50A_DESC
string.body: [%e1.StatUp.StatName] becomes faster by [%e1.StatUp.Value]%% for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime]. Cannot be used together with the Courage Scroll.\nYou can only use it in the Crucibles training arena.

string.name: STR_SCROLL_D_SPEED_CASTING_50A_DESC
string.body: [%e1.StatUp.StatName] becomes faster by [%e1.StatUp.Value]%% for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime]. Cannot be used together with the Courage Scroll.\nYou can only use it in the Crucibles training arena.

string.name: STR_POTION_L_HP_60A_DESC
string.body: Recovers [%e1.ProcHeal_Instant.Heal] HP instantly.\nYou can use it only in the Empyrean Crucible.

string.name: STR_POTION_D_HP_60A_DESC
string.body: Recovers [%e1.ProcHeal_Instant.Heal] HP instantly.\nYou can use it only in the Empyrean Crucible.

string.name: STR_POTION_L_MP_60A_DESC
string.body: Recovers [%e1.ProcMpHeal_Instant.Heal] MP instantly.\nYou can use it only in the Empyrean Crucible.

string.name: STR_POTION_D_MP_60A_DESC
string.body: Recovers [%e1.ProcMpHeal_Instant.Heal] MP instantly.\nYou can use it only in the Empyrean Crucible.

string.name: STR_POTION_L_HP_MP_60A_DESC
string.body: Recovers [%e1.ProcHeal_Instant.Heal] HP and [%e2.ProcMpHeal_Instant.Heal] MP instantly.\nYou can use it only in the Empyrean Crucible.

string.name: STR_POTION_D_HP_MP_60A_DESC
string.body: Recovers [%e1.ProcHeal_Instant.Heal] HP and [%e2.ProcMpHeal_Instant.Heal] MP instantly.\nYou can use it only in the Empyrean Crucible.

string.name: STR_POTION_L_CURE_PHYSICAL_30A_DESC
string.body: Heals abnormal physical conditions.\nYou can use it only in the Empyrean Crucible.

string.name: STR_POTION_D_CURE_PHYSICAL_30A_DESC
string.body: Heals abnormal physical conditions.\nYou can use it only in the Empyrean Crucible.

string.name: STR_WRAP_R_MATTER_OPTION_60A_DESC
string.body: Contains a random Manastone.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_D_R_MATTER_OPTION_60A_DESC
string.body: Contains a random Manastone.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_SKILL_L_IDARENA_01_DESC
string.body: Decreases Tahabata's skill damage during Academy exercises.

string.name: STR_SKILL_D_IDARENA_01_DESC
string.body: Decreases Tahabata's skill damage during Priory exercises.

string.name: STR_MATTER_OPTION_R_HEAL_SKILL_BOOST_60_DESC
string.body: Increases Healing Boost by 3 points when socketed.\nActivate the Manastone by double-clicking (or right-clicking) it, and then select the item to socket.

string.name: STR_SCROLL_ITEM_SEAL_01_DESC
string.body: Seals an item.\nActivate the Seal Scroll by double-clicking it, and then select the item you want to seal.

string.name: STR_SCROLL_ITEM_UNSEAL_NORMAL_01_DESC
string.body: Breaks the seal of an item.\nThe seal will break seven days after use.

string.name: STR_SCROLL_ITEM_UNSEAL_SPECIAL_01_DESC
string.body: Breaks the seal of an item.\nThe seal breaks immediately.

string.name: STR_CHARGE_ITEM_PIECE_01_DESC
string.body: Conditions eligible items up to Level 1.\nDouble-click on Conditioning and then select the applicable item.

string.name: STR_CHARGE_ITEM_PIECE_02_DESC
string.body: Conditions eligible items up to Level 2.\nDouble-click on Conditioning and then select the applicable item.

string.name: STR_CHARGE_ITEM_D_PIECE_01_DESC
string.body: Conditions eligible items up to Level 1.\nDouble-click on Conditioning and then select the applicable item.

string.name: STR_CHARGE_ITEM_D_PIECE_02_DESC
string.body: Conditions eligible items up to Level 2.\nDouble-click on Conditioning and then select the applicable item.

string.name: STR_CHARGE_ITEM_PACK_01_DESC
string.body: Conditions all eligible, equipped items up to Level 1.\nDouble-click on Deep Conditioning to activate.

string.name: STR_CHARGE_ITEM_PACK_02_DESC
string.body: Conditions all eligible, equipped items up to Level 2.\nDouble-click on Deep Conditioning to activate.

string.name: STR_CHARGE_ITEM_D_PACK_01_DESC
string.body: Conditions all eligible, equipped items up to Level 1.\nDouble-click on Deep Conditioning to activate.

string.name: STR_CHARGE_ITEM_D_PACK_02_DESC
string.body: Conditions all eligible, equipped items up to Level 2.\nDouble-click on Deep Conditioning to activate.

string.name: STR_WRAP_IDF4RE_DRANA_QUEST_A_DESC
string.body: A lump of gelatinous bodily fluid. You can feel something solid and round inside.\nCheck what's inside by double-clicking the lump

string.name: STR_WRAP_IDF4RE_DRANA_QUEST_B_DESC
string.body: The membrane stands between you and whatever's inside. Plus, it gets your hands all ooky.\nForce your way through by double-clicking the membrane.

string.name: STR_CASH_PETCARD_MULT_PENGUINNORMAL_01_DESC
string.body: Egg of a Highly Developed Potbelly Inquin.\nHighly Developed Potbelly Inquins carry 12-slot pouches and can pick up items during battle.\nVisit a Pet Minder to hatch this egg.

string.name: STR_CASH_PETCARD_MULT_PENGUINGOLD_01_DESC
string.body: Egg of a Highly Developed Crescent Inquin.\nHighly Developed Cresent Inquins carry 12-slot pouches and can pick up items during battle.\nVisit a Pet Minder to hatch this egg.

string.name: STR_CASH_PETCARD_WARE_MUMUWIFE_02_DESC
string.body: Egg of a Highly Developed Micro MuMu.\nHighly Developed Micro MuMus carry 18-slot pouches and can pick up items during battle.\nVisit a Pet Minder to hatch this egg.

string.name: STR_CASH_PETCARD_WARE_MUMUHUSBAND_02_DESC
string.body: Egg of a Highly Developed Mini MuMu.\nHighly Developed Mini MuMus carry 18-slot pouches and can pick up items during battle.\nVisit a Pet Minder to hatch this egg.

string.body: Usable only in the Crucible Challenge. Give it to a Arbiter to rejoin the battle.

string.name: STR_MATTER_PROC_PARALYZE_R2_50A_DESC
string.body: Imbues your weapon with an effect that has a 2%% chance to paralyse your target for 3 seconds.\nSee a Godstone Socketer to install it on your weapon.

string.name: STR_MATTER_PROC_SILENCE_R2_50A_DESC
string.body: Imbues your weapon with an effect that has a 5%% chance to silence your target for 5 seconds.\nSee a Godstone Socketer to install it on your weapon.

string.name: STR_MATTER_PROC_BLIND_R2_50A_DESC
string.body: Imbues your weapon with an effect that has a 5%% chance to blind your target for 5 seconds.\nSee a Godstone Socketer to install it on your weapon.

string.name: STR_MATTER_PROC_FIRE_DAMAGE_R2_50A_DESC
string.body: Imbues your weapon with an effect that has a 2%% chance to inflict 750 points of fire damage on your target.\nSee a Godstone Socketer to install it on your weapon.

string.name: STR_MATTER_PROC_EARTH_DAMAGE_R2_50A_DESC
string.body: Imbues your weapon with an effect that has a 2%% chance to inflict 750 points of earth damage on your target.\nSee a Godstone Socketer to install it on your weapon.

string.name: STR_MATTER_PROC_POISON_R2_50A_DESC
string.body: Imbues your weapon with an effect that has a 10%% chance to inflict 38 points of poison damage on your target every 2 seconds for 16 seconds.\nSee a Godstone Socketer to install it on your weapon.

string.name: STR_MATTER_PROC_BLEED_R2_50A_DESC
string.body: Imbues your weapon with an effect that has a 8%% chance to inflict 71 points of bleed damage on your target every 2 seconds for 8 seconds.\nSee a Godstone Socketer to install it on your weapon.

string.body: 2% chance to Paralyse the target for 3 seconds.

string.body: 5% chance to Silence the target for 5 seconds.

string.name: STR_MATTER_PROC_BLEED_R2_50A_DESC_PROC

string.name: STR_EVENT_FOOD_OLYMPICS_01_DESC
string.body: A tasty loaf of grains, fruit, nuts, and chocolate to power you through difficult challenges.\nEating it increases [%e1.StatUp.StatName], [%e1.StatUp.StatName2], [%e2.StatUp.StatName], and [%e2.StatUp.StatName2] by [%e1.StatUp.Value], [%e1.StatUp.Value2], [%e2.StatUp.Value], and [%e2.StatUp.Value2] points respectively for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_AU_04_DESC
string.body: A white ribbon made of soft material. Good things happen to those who gather them.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_AU_05_DESC
string.body: Silky smooth flower petals. Good things happen to those who gather them.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_AU_06_DESC
string.body: Comet powder that shimmers beautifully. Good things happen to those who gather it.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_AU_07_DESC
string.body: A sweet Dado that is too tough to eat. Good things happen to those who gather them.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_AU_08_DESC
string.body: A lump of pure silver. Good things happen to those who gather them.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_FOOD_SWEET_2STATS_01A_DESC
string.body: A tart as sweet as honey.\n[%e1.StatUp.StatName], [%e1.StatUp.StatName2], [%e2.StatUp.StatName], and [%e2.StatUp.StatName2] increase by [%e1.StatUp.Value], [%e1.StatUp.Value2], [%e2.StatUp.Value], and [%e2.StatUp.Value2] points respectively for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_FOOD_SWEET_2STATS_02A_DESC
string.body: A cookie topped with sweet and crunchy peanut butter.\n[%e1.StatUp.StatName], [%e1.StatUp.StatName2],[%e2.StatUp.StatName], and [%e2.StatUp.StatName2] increase by [%e1.StatUp.Value], [%e1.StatUp.Value2], [%e2.StatUp.Value], and [%e2.StatUp.Value2] points respectively for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_FOOD_SWEET_2STATS_03A_DESC
string.body: A soft ice cream made of Omblic flavored milk.\n[%e1.StatUp.StatName] and [%e2.StatUp.StatName] increase by [%e1.StatUp.Value] and [%e2.StatUp.Value] points respectively for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_Event_ADD_TITLE_186_15_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <Atreias Challenger>, increasing your attack speed by 2%%, your casting speed by 2%% and your movement speed by 3%%.\nValid for 15 days.

string.name: STR_Event_ADD_CUSTOMIZE_MOTION_NINJA_01_DESC
string.body: Changes Idle, Run, Jump and Rest motions into near-silent motions.\nYou can use each motion for 30 days.

string.name: STR_Event_ADD_CUSTOMIZE_MOTION_HOVERING_01_DESC
string.body: Lets you hover above the ground when youre inactive, run or jump.\nYou can use these motions for 30 days.

string.name: STR_Event_ADD_CUSTOMIZE_MOTION_NINJA_02_DESC
string.body: Changes Idle, Run, Jump and Rest motions into near-silent motions.\nYou can use each motion for 7 days.

string.name: STR_Event_ADD_CUSTOMIZE_MOTION_HOVERING_02_DESC
string.body: Changes Idle, Run, Jump, and Rest to hovering motions.\nYou can use these motions for 7 days.

string.name: STR_Event_ADD_CUSTOMIZE_MOTION_NINJA_03_DESC
string.body: Changes Idle, Run, Jump and Rest motions into near-silent motions.

string.name: STR_EVENT_ADD_CUSTOMIZE_MOTION_HOVERING_03_DESC
string.body: Turns your Idle, Run, Jump and Rest motions into Hovering motions.

string.name: STR_Event_ADD_TITLE_192_30_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <Chaser of Atreia>, increasing your attack power by 2, your magic boost by 10, your movement speed by 4%% and your PvP Attack by 2%%.\nValid for 30 days.

string.name: STR_EVENT_SCROLL_START_KIT_01_DESC
string.body: No Soul Sickness if you are killed, and you keep all your XP. Teleport and flight transportation only cost 1 Kinah. The effect lasts for 1 hour.

string.name: STR_Classic_POTION_A_FLYTIME_01A_DESC
string.body: Increases your flight time by 30 seconds if used while flying.

string.name: STR_Classic_POTION_A_FLYTIME_02A_DESC
string.body: Increases your flight time by 45 seconds if used while flying.

string.name: STR_Classic_POTION_A_FLYTIME_03A_DESC
string.body: Increases your flight time by 60 seconds if used while flying.

string.name: STR_Event_ADD_TITLE_201_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <Trailblazer>, increasing your movement speed by 2%%, your flight speed by 2%%, your attack speed by 1%% and your casting speed by 1%%.

string.name: STR_Event_ADD_TITLE_202_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <First Conqueror of Kromede>, increasing your attack speed by 1%%, your casting speed by 1%% and your HP by 80.

string.name: STR_Event_ADD_TITLE_203_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <First Conqueror of Bakarma>, increasing your movement speed by 2%%, your attack speed by 1%%, your casting speed by 1%% and your HP by 100.

string.name: STR_Event_ADD_TITLE_204_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <First Fortress Commander>, increasing your flight speed by 4%% and your HP and MP by 100.

string.name: STR_Event_ADD_TITLE_205_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <First Elyos Officer>, increasing your phys. attack. by 2, your magic boost by 10, crit strike by 4 and crit spell by 2.

string.name: STR_Event_ADD_TITLE_206_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <First Asmodian Officer>, increasing your phys. attack. by 2, your magic boost by 10, crit strike by 4 and crit spell by 2.

string.name: STR_Event_ADD_TITLE_207_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <First Slayer>, increasing your PvP defence by 1%%, your evasion by 5 and your resist magic by 5.

string.name: STR_GM_TORSO_COMPLIMENT_01A_DESC

string.body: A GM outfit that insults and criticizes.

string.name: STR_cash_ms_torso_classic_wolfboy

string.name: STR_cash_ms_torso_classic_wolfboy_DESC
string.body: In battle you transform from Little Red Riding Hood into a wolf cub, and vice versa.

string.name: STR_cash_ms_torso_classic_blackseethrough_DESC

string.name: STR_cash_ms_torso_classic_mask_DESC

string.name: STR_cash_ms_torso_classic_revers_DESC

string.name: STR_cash_ms_torso_classic_captain_DESC

string.name: STR_cash_ms_torso_classic_fantasytale_DESC

string.name: STR_cash_head_classic_redcarpetdress_DESC

string.name: STR_cash_head_classic_catsdress_DESC

string.name: STR_cash_head_classic_blackseethrough_DESC

string.name: STR_cash_head_classic_mask_DESC

string.name: STR_cash_head_classic_revers_DESC

string.name: STR_cash_head_classic_captain_DESC

string.name: STR_cash_head_classic_fantasytale_DESC

string.name: STR_Classic_XPBOOST_PCBANG_02_DESC
string.body: You receive 20%% additional XP from hunting, gathering, and crafting while this effect lasts.\nThe effect lasts for 1 hour and then takes 1 hour to recover. Will not be doubled by other effects of this kind.

string.name: STR_Classic_DRBOOST_PCBANG_02_DESC
string.body: The chance of capturing items from creatures when hunting is increased by 20%% while this effect lasts. \nThe effect lasts for one hour and the cooldown is one hour. Will not be doubled by other effects of this kind.

string.name: STR_Event_ADD_TITLE_219_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <First Dredgion Champion>, increasing your attack speed by 1%%, your casting speed by 1%%, your PvP attack by 1%% and your PvP defence by 1%%.

string.name: STR_Event_ADD_TITLE_220_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <Dark Poeta Specialist>, increasing your attack power by 3, your magic boost by 15 and your HP and MP by 100.

string.name: STR_Event_ADD_TITLE_226_DESC

An Antipaari Egg.
It gives you a bundle of Choco Tteok when you feed it.
Visit a Pet Minder to hatch this egg.
Follows you for 21 days.

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_CANDY_PENGUIN_01_DESC
string.body: Choose between 3 Transformation Candy Packets for the Valiant, Wise or Fancy Inquin.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_CANDY_PENGUIN_PHY_01_DESC
string.body: Contains Valiant Inquin Transformation Candies. Increases physical attack by 2, accuracy by 48, movement speed by 3%% and attack speed by 3%% for 60 minutes. \nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_CANDY_PENGUIN_MAG_01_DESC
string.body: Contains Wise Inquin Transformation Candies. Increases magic boost by 10, magical accuracy by 48, movement speed by 3%% and casting speed by 3%% for 60 minutes.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_CANDY_PENGUIN_HYB_01_DESC

string.name: STR_EVENT_ADD_TITLE248
string.body: [Event] [Title Card] Like at Harvest Revel (3 days)

string.name: STR_EVENT_ADD_TITLE256
string.body: [Event] [Title Card] Wind in the Sails (3 days)

string.name: STR_EVENT_ADD_TITLE248_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <Like at Harvest Revel>, increasing your movement speed by 3%%, your flight speed by 3%%, your attack speed by 3%% and your casting speed by 3%%.\nValid for 3 days.

string.name: STR_EVENT_ADD_TITLE249_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <New Skies>, increasing your movement speed by 3%%, your flight speed by 3%%, your attack speed by 3%% and your casting speed by 3%%.\nValid for 3 days.

string.name: STR_EVENT_ADD_TITLE250_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <Expressive>, increasing your movement speed by 3%%, your flight speed by 3%%, your attack speed by 3%% and your casting speed by 3%%.\nValid for 3 days.

string.name: STR_EVENT_ADD_TITLE251_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <Solitary Protector>, increasing your movement speed by 3%%, your flight speed by 3%%, your attack speed by 3%% and your casting speed by 3%%.\nValid for 3 days.

string.name: STR_EVENT_ADD_TITLE252_DESC

string.name: STR_EVENT_ADD_TITLE253_DESC

string.name: STR_EVENT_ADD_TITLE254_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <Silent Night>, increasing your movement speed by 3%%, your flight speed by 3%%, your attack speed by 3%% and your casting speed by 3%%.\nValid for 3 days.

string.name: STR_EVENT_ADD_TITLE255_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <New Beginnings>, increasing your movement speed by 3%%, your flight speed by 3%%, your attack speed by 3%% and your casting speed by 3%%.\nValid for 3 days.

string.name: STR_event_treasuremap_dummy_01_DESC
string.body: An ominous treasure map. Elyos can have it identified by the archaeologist Gogoas, Asmodians by Gogohwas.

string.name: STR_event_idlf1_Srank_dummy_01_DESC
string.body: An insignia for Daevas who have defeated the Tahabata Pyrelord.\nUse the Design: Crafted Tahabata Chest to craft.

string.name: STR_SUB_OPTIONPROB_U_100_50A_DESC
string.body: A socketing aid that guarantees manastone-socketing success.\nCan be used on Fabled grade equipment.

string.name: STR_SUB_OPTIONPROB_E_100_50A_DESC
string.body: A socketing aid that guarantees manastone-socketing success.\nCan be used on Eternal grade equipment.

string.name: STR_SALE_EXPLAIN_BUY_LIMIT_AM_08
string.body: These items are only sold in a limited quantity each day. Items that are sold out will be replenished every day at 8 AM.

string.name: STR_MEDAL_04_DESC
string.body: A decoration awarded to Daevas performing distinguished service in siege warfare.

string.body: [Event] Alliance Stigma Master Summoning Stone Chest

string.name: STR_Classic_lucky_Coin_01_DESC
string.body: They will definitely come in handy at some point.

string.body: Just like the Festival Coins, toss it into the fountain to make your wishes come true.

string.body: Open to select a Novices weapon.

string.name: STR_WRAP_DEVAPASS_SCROLL_INIT_COOLT_L_02_DESC
string.body: Upon opening, you can select an Entry Scroll for Dark Poeta, Theobomos Lab, Draupnir Cave or Steel Rake.

string.name: STR_WRAP_DEVAPASS_SCROLL_INIT_COOLT_D_02_DESC
string.body: Upon opening, you can select an Entry Scroll for Dark Poeta, Adma Stronghold, Draupnir Cave or Steel Rake.

string.name: STR_classic_event_food_3stats_50a_DESC
string.body: Increases [%e1.StatUp.StatName] for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime] by [%e1.StatUp.Value] points and [%e2.StatUp.StatName] by [%e2.StatUp.Value] points. Additionally, [%e3.StatUp.StatName] increases for [%e3.StatUp.Value] seconds.

string.name: STR_classic_event_food_3stats_50b_DESC
string.body: Increases [%e1.StatUp.StatName] for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime] by [%e1.StatUp.Value] points and [%e2.StatUp.StatName] by [%e2.StatUp.Value] points. Additionally, [%e3.StatUp.StatName] increases for [%e3.StatUp.Value] seconds.

string.name: STR_wrap_event_pass_proc_01_DESC
string.body: Contains a random Godstone.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_CASH_PETCARD_WARE_GOLIATH_01_DESC
string.body:
The egg of a Tin Narky.
Carries a 22-space pet bag.
Visit a Pet Minder to hatch this egg.
The pet stays with you for 90 days.

string.name: STR_wrap_event_pass_whitedaybox_01_DESC
string.body: Contains Weapons of Rapture.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_wrap_event_pass_treasurebox_03_DESC
string.body: Contains a Lesser Ancient Crown, Ancient Crown, Greater Ancient Crown or Major Ancient Crown.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_wrap_event_pass_enchantbox_01_DESC
string.body: Contains 3 [Event] Enchantment Stones (Level 70), 2 [Event] Enchantment Stones (Level 75) or 2 [Event] Enchantment Stones (Level 80).\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_SUMMER_FESTIVAL_BOX_01_DESC
string.body: Open to receive the [Event] [Title Card] Summer Reveller (15 days) or an [Event] Festive Enchantment Chest.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_SUMMER_FESTIVAL_GROW_BOX_01_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 [Event] Festive Level 25 Ascension Assistant, 3 [Event] Lodas Amulets III, 20 [Event] Greater Sprinting Scroll, 20 [Event] Greater Awakening Scrolls and 20 [Event] Greater Courage Scrolls.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_SUMMER_FESTIVAL_GROW_BOX_25_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 [Event] Festive Level 30 Ascension Assistant, 3 [Event] Lodas Amulets III, 50 [Event] Life Potions, 50 [Event] Mana Potions and 1 [Event] Entry Scroll for the Nochsana Training Camp.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_SUMMER_FESTIVAL_GROW_BOX_30_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 [Event] Festive Level 40 Ascension Assistant, 5 [Event] Lodas Amulets III, 3 [Event] Speedy Polar Bear Transformation Candy Boxes, 30 [Event] Sweet Wine and 30 [Event] Succulent Samosas. \nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_SUMMER_FESTIVAL_GROW_BOX_40_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 [Event] Festive Level 45 Ascension Assistant, 5 [Event] Lodas Amulets III, 30 [Event] Greater Healing Potions, 3 [Event] Speedy Polar Bear Transformation Candy Boxes, 2 [Event] Group Kisks and 2 [Event] Entry Scrolls for the Draupnir Cave.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_SUMMER_FESTIVAL_GROW_BOX_45_DESC
string.body: Contains 5 [Event] Lodas Amulets III, 50 [Event] Greater Sprinting Scroll, 50 [Event] Greater Awakening Scrolls, 50 [Event] Greater Courage Scrolls, 30 [Event] Sweet Wines and 30 [Event] Succulent Samosas.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_SUMMER_ENCHANTBOX_01_DESC
string.body: Contains a level 70, 75, 80 or 85 [Event] Enchantment Stone.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_EVENT_ADD_TITLE257_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <Summer Reveller>, increasing your movement speed by 3%%, your flight speed by 3%%, your attack speed by 3%% and your casting speed by 3%%.\nValid for 15 days.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_SUMMER_FESTIVAL_BOX_DESC
string.body: Open to receive an [Event] Festive Level 1 Ascension Assistant Chest.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_SIEL_ENCHANTBOX_01_DESC
string.body: Contains a random level 70, 75 or 80 [Event] Enchantment Stone.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_event_idlf1_Srank_dummy_02_DESC
string.body: The Crafted Tahabata Chest contains this insignia.\nUse the Design: Tahabata Weapon Chest to craft.

string.name: STR_wrap_classic_idlf1_SrankBox_01_DESC
string.body: Can only be crafted by Daevas who have defeated Tahabata Pyrelord.\nDouble-click to receive a random item.

string.name: STR_wrap_classic_idlf1_SrankBox_02_DESC
string.body: Upon opening, you can select between a Tahabata weapon or a Tahabata shield.

string.name: STR_wrap_classic_idlf1_SrankBox_03_DESC
string.body: Contains a random Anuhart item: Weapon, Top, Trousers, Shoe, Glove or Shoulder Armour Box.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_wrap_classic_idlf1_SrankBox_04_DESC
string.body: Upon opening, you can select an Anuhart weapon.

string.name: STR_wrap_classic_idlf1_SrankBox_05_DESC
string.body: Upon opening, you can select an Anuhart top.

string.name: STR_wrap_classic_idlf1_SrankBox_06_DESC
string.body: Upon opening, you can select a pair of Anuhart trousers.

string.name: STR_wrap_classic_idlf1_SrankBox_07_DESC
string.body: Upon opening, you can select a pair of Anuhart shoes.

string.name: STR_event_kisk_light_force_Rabbit_DESC
string.body: Summons a Kisk which resurrects the fallen at its location. It lasts for 2 hours and can be activated by up to 24 Alliance members.\nOnly usable by members of the same alliance as the summoner.

string.name: STR_event_kisk_dark_force_Rabbit_DESC
string.body: Summons a Kisk which resurrects the fallen at its location. It lasts for 2 hours and can be activated by up to 24 Alliance members.\nOnly usable by members of the same alliance as the summoner.

string.name: STR_petcard_ware_DrakyRed_30day_DESC
string.body:
The egg of a Sunset Drakie.
Carries a 18-space pet bag.
Visit a Pet Minder to hatch this egg.
The pet stays with you for 30 days.

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_CANDY_SEA_PANDA_01
string.body: Sea Panda Transformation Candy Selection Box

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_CANDY_MOUTAIN_PANDA_01_DESC
string.body: Choose a Transformation Candy for the Valiant, Wise or Fancy Panda.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_CANDY_SEA_PANDA_01_DESC
string.body: Choose a Transformation Candy for the Valiant, Wise or Fancy Sea Panda.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_CASH_CANDY_L_MOUTAIN_PANDA_PHY_01_DESC
string.body: You transform into a panda that can use skills for 60 minutes. Your [%e2.StatUp.StatName] and [%e2.StatUp.StatName2] increase by [%e2.StatUp.Value] and [%e2.StatUp.Value2] points respectively, and your [%e3.StatUp.StatName] and [%e3.StatUp.StatName2] increase by [%e3.StatUp.Value]%% and [%e3.StatUp.Value2]%% respectively.

string.name: STR_CLASSIC_FESTIVAL_COIN_01_DESC
string.body: A coin you obtained from Festa. Toss it into the Festive Fountain and receive gifts.\nAlternatively, you can exchange it with Collectra.\nThis item will disappear at the end of the event.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_SUMMER_FOUNTAIN_DESC
string.body: Contains either 1 [Event] Godstone Bundle, 1 [Event] Major Ancient Crown Chest, 1 [Event] Greater Ancient Crown, 1 [Event] Normal Ancient Crown, 1 [Event] Enchantment Stone Level 80, 1 [Event] Enchantment Stone Level 75 or 1 [Event] Enchantment Stone Level 70.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_SUMMER_MATTER_PROC_BOX_DESC
string.body: You receive this Godstone Bundle for using a Festive Fountain Coin.\nDouble-click to receive a random item.

string.name: STR_EVENT_MATTER_PROC_PARALYZE_L1_40A_DESC
string.body: Adds a weapon effect that paralyses a target for 2 seconds with 5%% probability.\nA Godstone Socketer can equip it on your weapon.

string.name: STR_EVENT_MATTER_PROC_SILENCE_L1_40B_DESC
string.body: Adds a weapon effect that silences a target for 5 seconds with 8%% probability.\nA Godstone Socketer can equip it on your weapon.

string.name: STR_EVENT_MATTER_PROC_BLIND_L1_40B_DESC
string.body: Adds a weapon effect that blinds a target for 8 seconds with 5%% probability.\nA Godstone Socketer can equip it on your weapon.

string.name: STR_EVENT_MATTER_PROC_STUN_L1_40A_DESC
string.body: Adds a weapon effect that stuns a target for 1 second with 6%% probability.\nA Godstone Socketer can equip it on your weapon.

string.name: STR_EVENT_MATTER_PROC_AIR_DAMAGE_L1_40B_DESC
string.body: Adds a weapon effect that deals 940 wind damage to a target with 2%% probability.\nA Godstone Socketer can equip it on your weapon.

string.name: STR_EVENT_MATTER_PROC_WATER_DAMAGE_L1_40B_DESC
string.body: Adds a weapon effect that deals 940 water damage to a target with 2%% probability.\nA Godstone Socketer can equip it on your weapon.

string.name: STR_EVENT_MATTER_PROC_FIRE_DAMAGE_L1_40A_DESC
string.body: Adds a weapon effect that deals 188 fire damage to a target with 10%% probability.\nA Godstone Socketer can equip it on your weapon.

string.name: STR_EVENT_MATTER_PROC_EARTH_DAMAGE_L1_40A_DESC
string.body: Adds a weapon effect that deals 188 earth damage to a target with 10%% probability.\nA Godstone Socketer can equip it on your weapon.

string.name: STR_EVENT_MATTER_PROC_AIR_DAMAGE_L1_40A_DESC
string.body: Adds a weapon effect that deals 94 wind damage to a target with 20%% probability.\nA Godstone Socketer can equip it on your weapon.

string.name: STR_EVENT_MATTER_PROC_WATER_DAMAGE_L1_40A_DESC
string.body: Adds a weapon effect that deals 94 water damage to a target with 20%% probability.\nA Godstone Socketer can equip it on your weapon.

string.name: STR_EVENT_MATTER_PROC_PARALYZE_L1_40A_DESC_PROC
string.body: Paralyses the target for 5 seconds with 2% probability.

string.name: STR_EVENT_MATTER_PROC_SILENCE_L1_40B_DESC_PROC
string.body: Silences the target for 8 seconds with 5% probability.

string.name: STR_EVENT_MATTER_PROC_BLIND_L1_40B_DESC_PROC
string.body: Blinds the target for 8 seconds with 5% probability.

string.name: STR_EVENT_MATTER_PROC_STUN_L1_40A_DESC_PROC
string.body: Stuns the target for 1 second with 6% probability.

string.name: STR_EVENT_MATTER_PROC_AIR_DAMAGE_L1_40B_DESC_PROC
string.body: Inflicts 940 points of wind damage with a 2% probability.

string.name: STR_EVENT_MATTER_PROC_WATER_DAMAGE_L1_40B_DESC_PROC
string.body: Inflicts 940 points of water damage with a 2% probability.

string.name: STR_EVENT_MATTER_PROC_FIRE_DAMAGE_L1_40A_DESC_PROC
string.body: Inflicts 188 points of fire damage with a 10% probability.

string.name: STR_EVENT_MATTER_PROC_EARTH_DAMAGE_L1_40A_DESC_PROC
string.body: Inflicts 188 points of earth damage with a 10% probability.

string.name: STR_EVENT_MATTER_PROC_AIR_DAMAGE_L1_40A_DESC_PROC
string.body: Inflicts 94 points of wind damage with a 20% probability.

string.name: STR_EVENT_MATTER_PROC_WATER_DAMAGE_L1_40A_DESC_PROC
string.body: Inflicts 94 points of water damage with a 20% probability.

string.name: STR_Event_Classic_Junk_Map_V17_L_DESC
string.body: There are no locations marked on the map. You can sell it in the shop for Kinah, or take it to Gogohwas to exchange it for an [Event] Festival Costume Box.

string.body: There are no locations marked on the map. You can sell it in the shop for Kinah, or take it to Gogohwas to exchange it for an [Event] Festival Costume Box.

string.name: STR_WORLD_CN_CASH_WING_CAT01_DESC

string.name: STR_WORLD_CN_CASH_WING_MAGPIE02_DESC

string.name: STR_wrap_event_scroll_4_choose_box_DESC
string.body: Choose 5 pieces of one of the following scrolls: [Event] Greater Sprinting Scroll, [Event] Greater Awakening Scroll, [Event] Greater Raging Wind Scroll or [Event] Greater Courage Scroll.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_wrap_event_food_choose_box_v17_DESC

string.name: STR_CASH_MS_TORSO_CLASSIC_CHIFFON_01_DESC
string.body: How beautifully the chiffon billows through the sun and beach!

string.name: STR_CASH_HEAD_CLASSIC_CHIFFON_01_DESC

string.name: STR_CASH_WING_CLASSIC_CHIFFON_01_DESC
string.body: Wings for Beach Heroes who have risen from the sea.

string.name: STR_CASH_MS_TORSO_CLASSIC_NAVY01_DESC
string.body: A costume for a day full of fresh ocean wind.

string.name: STR_CASH_HEAD_CLASSIC_NAVY01_DESC
string.body: The beret for any nautical fashion expert.

string.name: STR_CASH_SHIELD_CHAGESKIN_NEONSTAR_01_DESC
string.body: You could start a rave with this shield.\nYou can use it to change the appearance of another item.

string.name: STR_CASH_SHIELD_CHAGESKIN_CUTEFACE_01A_DESC
string.body: A shield youd almost like to pet.\nYou can use it to change the appearance of another item.

string.name: STR_CASH_SHIELD_CHAGESKIN_CUTEANIMAL_01A_DESC
string.body: A well-mannered shield for cuddly cats.\nYou can use it to change the appearance of another item.

string.name: STR_WRAP_TW_CASH_LOVE_TREASURE_BOX_01_DESC
string.body: Open to receive either 1 Judges Fabled Weapon Chest, 1 I Can Hear Only You Couples Shirt, 1 [[Emotion Card] Forbidden Dance, 1 Bear Ear Headband, 1 [Event] Lesser Balaur Bundle, 1 Silver Medal, 1 Enchantment and Manastone Chest I, 10 [Event] Normal Divine Life Serums, 10 Normal Divine Mana Serums, 10 Lesser Divine Wind Serums, 10 [Event] Greater Recovery Serums, 6 [Event] Lodas Amulets III, 20 [Event] Ale Jellies or 3 Lodas Amulets III. \nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_EVENT_MS_TORSO_SULENTINE_02_DESC
string.body: A beautiful ceremonial outfit.\nPut it in your Jacket slot to wear.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_YUSTIEL_GROW_BOX_01_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 [Event] Yustiels Level 10 Ascension Assistant, 30 [Event] Common Running Scrolls, 30 [Event] Common Awakening Scrolls and 30 [Event] Common Courage Scrolls.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_YUSTIEL_GROW_BOX_10_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 [Event] Yustiels Level 15 Ascension Assistant, 3 [Event] Lodas Amulets III and 3 [Event] Speedy Polar Bear Transformation Candy Boxes.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_YUSTIEL_GROW_BOX_20_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 [Event] Yustiels Level 25 Ascension Assistant, 30 [Event] Life Potions, 30 [Event] Mana Potions and 1 [Event] Tombstone of Revival.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_YUSTIEL_GROW_BOX_25_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 [Event] Yustiels Level 30 Ascension Assistant, 3 [Event] Lodas Amulets III, 30 [Event] Sweet Wine, 30 [Event] Succulent Samosas or 1 [Event] Entry Scroll for the Nochsana Training Camp.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_YUSTIEL_GROW_BOX_30_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 [Event] Yustiels Level 35 Ascension Assistant, 30 [Event] Common Running Scrolls, 30 [Event] Common Awakening Scrolls and 30 [Event] Common Courage Scrolls.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_YUSTIEL_GROW_BOX_35_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 [Event] Yustiels Level 39 Ascension Assistant, 3 [Event] Lodas Amulets III, 3 [Event] Speedy Polar Bear Transformation Candy Boxes, 30 [Event] Sweet Wine and 30 [Event] Succulent Samosas.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_YUSTIEL_GROW_BOX_39_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 [Event] Yustiels Level 42 Ascension Assistant, 3 [Event] Lodas Amulets III, 30 [Event] Greater Healing Potions, 2 [Event] Yasbas Grace, 2 [Event] Group Kisk and 2 [Event] Entry Scrolls for the Draupnir Cave.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_YUSTIEL_GROW_BOX_42_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 [Event] Yustiels Level 45 Ascension Assistant, 4 [Event] Lodas Amulet III Chests, 3 [Event] Transformation Candy: Speedy Polar Bear Chests (3 pieces), 30 [Event] Greater Raging Wind Scrolls, 30 [Event] Greater Divine Wind Serums, 1 [Event] Tombstones of Revival and 2 [Event] Entry Scrolls for the Steel Rake.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_YUSTIEL_GROW_BOX_45_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 [Event] Yustiels Level 50 Ascension Assistant, 4 [Event] Lodas Amulets III, 50 [Event] Greater Sprinting Scrolls, 50 [Event] Greater Awakening Scrolls, 50 [Event] Greater Courage Scrolls, 50 [Event] Major Recovery Potions.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_YUSTIEL_GROW_BOX_50_DESC
string.body: Open to receive [Event] [Title Card] Yustiels Enlightenment (15 days).\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_YUSTIEL_NECKLACE_CHOOSE_BOX_DESC
string.body: Choose between the Guardian/Archon Tribunus Ruby or Sapphire Necklace.\nDouble-click to select.

string.body: Bestows the title <Yustiels Enlightenment>, increasing your movement speed by 3%%, your attack speed by 1%%, your casting speed by 1%% and your HP by 100.\nValid for 15 days.

string.name: STR_WRAP_US_DEVAPASS_S4_45BOX_DESC
string.body: Contains the Peacekeeper Daeva Robe and Peacekeeper Daeva Headdress.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_CASH_MS_TORSO_CLASSIC_GONRYONGPO01_DESC
string.body: The Dragon Robe but with a twist.

string.name: STR_CASH_HEAD_CLASSIC_GONRYONGPO01_DESC
string.body: A dragon crown for royal hipsters.

string.name: STR_CASH_WING_CLASSIC_GONRYONGPO01_DESC
string.body: Theyre hip and match the Dragon Robe.

string.name: STR_CASH_MS_TORSO_CLASSIC_JUMPSUIT_01_DESC
string.body: The chequered pattern is perfect for autumn.

string.name: STR_CASH_HEAD_CLASSIC_JUMPSUIT_01_DESC
string.body: The chequered pattern is perfect for autumn.

string.name: STR_EVENT_WING_2021_CHUSEOK_MOON_02_DESC
string.body: Wings with a laughing full moon.

string.name: STR_EVENT_WING_2021_CHUSEOK_MOON_03_DESC
string.body: Wings with a sad full moon.

string.name: STR_EVENT_WING_2021_CHUSEOK_MOON_04_DESC
string.body: Wings with a giggling full moon.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_CHUSEOK_WING_BOX_01_DESC
string.body: Open to receive Moonchild Wings, Cacklemoon Wings, Crymoon Wings, or Tittermoon Wings.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_Classic_lucky_Coin_02_DESC
string.body: A coin you obtained through the event pass. Borminerk will give you some quality items for it.\nThis item will disappear at the end of the event.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_CHUSEOK_TRESURE_BOX_01_DESC
string.body: Contains a Major Ancient Crown or a Greater Ancient Crown.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_CLASSIC_EVENT_CHUSEOK_FOOD_3STATS_50A_DESC
string.body: Increases [%e1.StatUp.StatName] for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime] by [%e1.StatUp.Value] points and [%e2.StatUp.StatName] by [%e2.StatUp.Value] points. Additionally, [%e3.StatUp.StatName] increases for [%e3.StatUp.Value] seconds.

string.name: STR_CLASSIC_EVENT_CHUSEOK_FOOD_3STATS_50B_DESC
string.body: Increases [%e1.StatUp.StatName] for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime] by [%e1.StatUp.Value] points and [%e2.StatUp.StatName] by [%e2.StatUp.Value] points. Additionally, [%e3.StatUp.StatName] increases for [%e3.StatUp.Value] seconds.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_CHUSEOK_SCROLL_INIT_COOLT_L_02_DESC
string.body: Upon opening, you can select an Entry Scroll for Dark Poeta, Theobomos Lab, Draupnir Cave or Steel Rake.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_CHUSEOK_SCROLL_INIT_COOLT_D_02_DESC
string.body: Upon opening, you can select an Entry Scroll for Dark Poeta, Adma Stronghold, Draupnir Cave or Steel Rake.

string.name: STR_WORLD_US_EVENT_HEAD_CLASSIC_WILDWEST_01_DESC
string.body: This headgear adds the finishing flourish to any Cowboy Outfit.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_CHUSEOK_MATTER_ENCHANT_BOX_01_DESC
string.body: Open to receive 3 [Event] Enchantment Stones (Level 70), 2 [Event] Enchantment Stones (Level 75) or 2 [Event] Enchantment Stones (Level 80).\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_Key_Ab1_1011_Raid_01_DESC
string.body: Menotios was once sealed by Ereshkigals power, but this item can break the seal.

string.name: STR_CASH_MS_TORSO_CLASSIC_PICNIC_01_DESC
string.body: Set out for a nice autumn picnic in this dress.

string.name: STR_CASH_MS_TORSO_CLASSIC_ANIMAL_01A_DESC
string.body: Oh, youve turned into a cat! Purr, purr.

string.body: A uniform befitting the highest martial arts.

string.name: STR_CASH_MS_TORSO_CLASSIC_WEDDINGDRESS01_DESC

string.name: STR_CASH_CANDY_L_FOX_PHY_01_DESC

string.name: STR_KISK_HIDE_LIGHT_PRIVATE_SMALL_DESC
string.body: Summons a Kisk which resurrects the fallen at its location. It lasts for 2 hours and can be activated by 1 person.\nOnly the caster can use it.

string.name: STR_KISK_HIDE_LIGHT_PARTY_SMALL_DESC
string.body: Summons a Kisk which resurrects the fallen at its location. It lasts for 2 hours and can be activated by up to 6 Alliance members.\nOnly usable by members of the same group as the summoner.

string.name: STR_KISK_HIDE_LIGHT_FORCE_MEDIUM_DESC
string.body: Summons a Kisk which resurrects the fallen at its location. It lasts for 2 hours and can be activated by up to 24 Alliance members.\nOnly usable by members of the same alliance as the summoner.

string.name: STR_KISK_HIDE_LIGHT_LEGION_LARGE_DESC
string.body: Summons a Kisk which resurrects the fallen at its location. It lasts for 2 hours and can be activated by 48 people.\nIt can only be used by members of the same legion as the summoner, and its camouflage is only visible to Group or Alliance members.

string.name: STR_KISK_HIDE_DARK_PRIVATE_SMALL_DESC
string.body: Summons a Kisk which resurrects the fallen at its location. It lasts for 2 hours and can be activated by 1 person.\nOnly the caster can use it.

string.name: STR_KISK_HIDE_DARK_PARTY_SMALL_DESC
string.body: Summons a Kisk which resurrects the fallen at its location. It lasts for 2 hours and can be activated by up to 6 Alliance members.\nOnly usable by members of the same group as the summoner.

string.name: STR_KISK_HIDE_DARK_FORCE_MEDIUM_DESC
string.body: Summons a Kisk which resurrects the fallen at its location. It lasts for 2 hours and can be activated by up to 24 Alliance members.\nOnly usable by members of the same alliance as the summoner.

string.name: STR_KISK_HIDE_DARK_LEGION_LARGE_DESC
string.body: Summons a Kisk which resurrects the fallen at its location. It lasts for 2 hours and can be activated by 48 people.\nIt can only be used by members of the same legion as the summoner, and its camouflage is only visible to Group or Alliance members.

string.body: Daeva Pass: Random Dye Chest (3 types)

string.name: STR_EVENT_XPBOOST_05_DESC
string.body: You receive 30%% more XP from hunting, gathering and crafting while this amulets effects last. \nThe effect lasts for two hours and the cooldown is two hours.

string.name: STR_EVENT_ADD_TITLE271_DESC
string.body: You can assume the title <Starfollower>, increasing your Attack Speed by 1%%, your Casting Speed by 1%%, your Movement Speed by 3%% and your HP by 100.\nValid for 15 days.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_MARCUTAN_GROW_BOX_01_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 [Event] Marchutans Ascension Assistant (lv. 10), 10 [Event] Greater Sprinting Scrolls, 10 [Event] Life Potions and 10 [Event] Mana Potions.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_MARCUTAN_GROW_BOX_10_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 [Event] Marchutans Ascension Assistant (lv. 15), 2 [Event] Marchutans Amulets I, 10 [Event] Greater Awakening Scrolls and 10 [Event] Greater Courage Scrolls.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_MARCUTAN_GROW_BOX_15_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 [Event] Marchutans Ascension Assistant (lv. 20), 1 [Event] Transformation Candy Box: Speedy Polar Bear, 10 [Event] Sweet Wine and 10 [Event] Succulent Samosas.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_MARCUTAN_GROW_BOX_20_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 [Event] Marchutans Ascension Assistant (lv. 25), 2 [Event] Marchutans Amulets I, 10 [Event] Greater Sprinting Scrolls and 1 [Event] Tombstone of Revival.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_MARCUTAN_GROW_BOX_25_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 [Event] Marchutans Ascension Assistant (Level 30), 1 [Event] Transformation Candy Box: Speedy Polar Bear, 10 [Event] Lesser Wind Serums, 10 [Event] Greater Raging Wind Scroll and 1 [Event] Entry Scroll for the Nochsana Training Camp.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_MARCUTAN_GROW_BOX_30_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 [Event] Marchutans Ascension Assistant (lv. 37), 2 [Event] Marchutans Amulets I, 10 [Event] Greater Sprinting Scroll, 10 [Event] Greater Awakening Scroll and 10 [Event] Greater Courage Scrolls.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_MARCUTAN_GROW_BOX_37_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 [Event] Marchutans Ascension Assistant (lv. 42), 3 [Event] Marchutans Amulets I, 1 [Event] Transformation Candy Box: Speedy Polar Bear, 10 [Event] Greater Life Serums and 10 [Event] Greater Mana Serums.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_MARCUTAN_GROW_BOX_42_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 [Event] Marchutans Ascension Assistant (Level 45), 3 [Event] Marchutans Amulets I, 10 [Event] Greater Healing Potions, 2x [Event] Yasbas Grace and 1 [Event] Entry Scroll for the Draupnir Cave.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_MARCUTAN_GROW_BOX_45_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 [Event] Marchutans Ascension Assistant (Level 47), 4 [Event] Marchutans Amulets I, 1 [Event] Transformation Candy Box: Speedy Polar Bear, 1,000 [Event] Stigma Shards and 1 [Event] Entry Scroll for the Steel Rake.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_MARCUTAN_GROW_BOX_47_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 [Event] Marchutans Ascension Assistant (lv. 50), 4 [Event] Marchutans Amulets I, 20 [Event] Greater Sprinting Scroll, 20 [Event] Greater Awakening Scroll, 20 [Event] Greater Courage Scrolls and 20 Major Recovery Potions.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_MARCUTAN_GROW_BOX_50_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 Major Ancient Chalice, 1 [Event] [Title Card] Starfollower (15 days) and 1 [Event] Entry Scroll for Dark Poeta.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_item_light_title272_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <Bounty Expert>.\nThis title increases your HP by 200, your Resist Magic by 20 and your Movement Speed by 4%%.

string.name: STR_item_light_title273_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <Specialist>.\nThis title increases your HP by 200, your Resist Magic by 20 and your Movement Speed by 4%%.

string.name: STR_EVENT_ADD_TITLE274_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <Atreian Order of Merit>, increasing your movement speed by 3%%, your flight speed by 3%%, your attack speed by 3%% and your casting speed by 3%%.\nValid for 15 days.

A Stormwings egg.
The Pet cooks and uses magical items automatically for you and loots defeated adversaries.
Visit a Pet Minder to hatch this egg.
You can keep this companion for 30 days.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_IDLF1_EQUIP_TORSO_DESC
string.body: Upon opening, you can select an Anuhart top.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_IDLF1_EQUIP_PANTS_DESC
string.body: Upon opening, you can select a pair of Anuhart trousers.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_IDLF1_EQUIP_SHOULDER_DESC
string.body: Upon opening, you can select some Anuhart shoulder armour.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_IDLF1_EQUIP_GLOVE_DESC
string.body: Upon opening, you can select a pair of Anuhart gloves.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_IDLF1_EQUIP_SHOES_DESC
string.body: Upon opening, you can select a pair of Anuhart shoes.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WORLD_US_WRAP_EVENT_XMAS_TREASUREBOX_01_DESC
string.body: Open for a certain chance to receive a Normal, Great or Powerful Ancient Relic (Icon, Seal or Chalice).

string.name: STR_skill_idship_01_DESC
string.body: A perfidious attack used in Steel Rake. Inflicts physical damage on nearby enemies and stuns them.

string.name: STR_EVENT_ADD_SOCIAL_SNOWMAN_01_DESC
string.body: Unlocks the <Snowman> emote.\nThis emote can be used for 3 days.

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_CANDY_XMAS_01
string.body: Solorius Festival Transformation Candy Selection Box

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_CANDY_XMAS_01_DESC
string.body: Choose between 3 Transformation Candies for the Valiant, Wise or Fancy Solorius.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_CANDY_XMAS_01_PHY_DESC
string.body: Choose between 3 Transformation Candies for the Brave Cookie, Brave Rudolph or Brave Snowman.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_CANDY_XMAS_01_MAG_DESC

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_CANDY_XMAS_01_HYB_DESC
string.body: Choose between 3 Transformation Candies for the Fancy Cookie, Fancy Rudolph or Fancy Snowman.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_CASH_CANDY_Gingerbreadman_PHY_01_DESC
string.body: You transform into a biscuit that can use skills for 60 minutes. [%e2.StatUp.StatName] increases by [%e2.StatUp.Value] and [%e2.StatUp.StatName2] by [%e2.StatUp.Value2] points; [%e3.StatUp.StatName] increases by [%e3.StatUp.Value]%% and [%e3.StatUp.StatName2] by [%e3.StatUp.Value2]%%.

string.body: Choose between 3 Transformation Candies for the Valiant, Wise or Fancy Black Tiger.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_CANDY_PENGUIN_PHY_02
string.body: [Event] Brave Inquin Transformation Candy Selection Box

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_CANDY_PENGUIN_MAG_02
string.body: [Event] Wise Inquin Transformation Candy Selection Box

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_CANDY_PENGUIN_HYB_02
string.body: [Event] Fancy Inquin Transformation Candy Selection Box

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_CANDY_SEA_PANDA_02
string.body: [Event] Sea Panda Transformation Candy Selection Box

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_CANDY_FOX_02
string.body: [Event] Desert Fox Transformation Candy Selection Box

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_CANDY_PENGUIN_02_DESC
string.body: Choose an [Event] Transformation Candy Packets for the Brave, Wise or Fancy Inquin.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_CANDY_PENGUIN_PHY_02_DESC
string.body: Contains Valiant Inquin Transformation Candies. Increases physical attack by 2, accuracy by 48, movement speed by 3%% and attack speed by 3%% for 60 minutes. \nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_CANDY_PENGUIN_MAG_02_DESC
string.body: Contains Wise Inquin Transformation Candies. Increases magic boost by 10, magical accuracy by 48, movement speed by 3%% and casting speed by 3%% for 60 minutes.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_CANDY_PENGUIN_HYB_02_DESC
string.body: Contains Fancy Inquin Transformation Candies. Increases magic boost by 10, magical accuracy by 48, movement speed by 3%% and attack speed by 3%% for 60 minutes.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_CANDY_dog_02_DESC
string.body: Choose between 3 [Event] Transformation Candies for the Brave, Wise or Fancy Puppy.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_CANDY_cat_02_DESC
string.body: Choose between 3 [Event] Transformation Candies for the Brave, Wise or Fancy Kitten.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_CANDY_MOUTAIN_PANDA_02_DESC
string.body: Choose between 3 [Event] Transformation Candies for the Brave, Wise or Fancy Panda.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_CANDY_SEA_PANDA_02_DESC
string.body: Choose between 3 [Event] Transformation Candies for the Brave, Wise or Fancy Sea Panda.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_CANDY_FOX_02_DESC
string.body: Choose between 3 [Event] Transformation Candies for the Brave, Wise or Fancy Desert Fox.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_CANDY_SHEEP_02_DESC
string.body: Choose between 3 [Event] Transformation Candies for the Brave, Wise or Fancy Baa.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_CANDY_SHAPE_PINKTIGER_S02_DESC
string.body: Contains 3 [Event] Transformation Candies: Robust Pink Tiger.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_CANDY_SHAPE_WHITEBEAR_S02_DESC
string.body: Contains 3 [Event] Transformation Candies: Speedy Polar Bear.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_CANDY_02_DESC
string.body: Contains various Transformation Candy Boxes.\nDouble-click to receive a random item.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_IDPOGUSGAME_PAPERSKULL_SELECTBOX_01_DESC
string.body: Choose between the following masks: [Event] Gold Skull Mask, [Event] Silver Skull Mask, [Event] Dark Skull Mask, [Event] Magnificent Skull Mask, [Event] Rogue Skull Mask or the [Event] Doom Skull Mask.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WRAP_US_DEVAPASS_S8_45BOX_DESC
string.body: Contains the Dress and Hair Jewellery for the Red Carpet.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_CASH_PEARL_RANDOM_BOX_DESC
string.body: Upon opening, you receive one of many different items.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_EVENT_MS_TORSO_CLASSIC_BLACKTIGER_01_DESC
string.body: These are the fine robes of a Dark Tiger.

string.name: STR_CLASSIC_EVENT_COIN_BLACKTIGER_TOOTH_DESC
string.body: You received it after completing the Event Pass. Take it to the Tiger Collector, who will give you some quality items for it.\nThis item will disappear at the end of the event.

string.name: STR_EVENT_PETCARD_WARE_LITTLELBLACKTIGER_30DAY_DESC
string.body: A black Mau egg.\nCarries a 20-space pet bag.\nVisit a Pet Minder to hatch this egg.

string.name: STR_CASH_MS_TORSO_CLASSIC_PANDA01_DESC
string.body: A warm costume with little panda ears.

string.name: STR_WORLD_US_EVENT_PETCARD_WARE_R_CHERUBIM_30DAY_DESC
string.body:
The egg of a Crimson Kerub.
Carries a 16-space pet bag.
Visit a Pet Minder to hatch this egg.
The pet stays with you for 30 days.

string.name: STR_WORLD_US_EVENT_PETCARD_WARE_R_CHERUBIM_90DAY_DESC
string.body:
The egg of a Crimson Kerub.
Carries a 16-space pet bag.
Visit a Pet Minder to hatch this egg.
The pet stays with you for 90 days.

string.name: STR_WRAP_US_EVENTPASS_REWARD_01_DESC
string.body: Contains 2 [Event] L85 Enchantment Stones.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_EVENT_ADD_SOCIAL_DEEP_BOW_01_DESC
string.body: Unlocks the <Kneel> emote.\nThis emote can be used for 3 days.

string.name: STR_EVENT_HEAD_CLASSIC_BLACKTIGER_01_DESC
string.body: The fine hair jewellery of the Roaring Dark Tiger.

string.name: STR_Event_ADD_TITLE_276_30_DESC
string.body: You can assume the title <Fast Pursuer>, increasing your Attack Power by 2, your Magic Boost by 10, your Movement Speed by 5%% and your PvP Attack by 2%%.\nValid for 30 days.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_DEVAPASS_MATTER_ENCHANT_RANDOMBOX_02_DESC
string.body: Contains a random level 91-100 Enchantment Stone.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_wrap_classic_idship_WPBox_01_DESC

string.name: STR_EVENT_PETCARD_MULT_DRAGONZMEYGREEN_30DAY_DESC

string.name: STR_JUNK_FEED_DRAGONZMEYGREEN_PET_01_DESC

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_DEVAPASS_DRAGON_TREASUREBOX_01_DESC
string.body: Contains either 10x Lustrous Balaur Meat, 10x Fresh Balaur Meat, 10x Tender Balaur Meat, 10x Thick Balaur Skin, 10x Thick Balaur Horn, 10x Thick Balaur Scale, 10x Hard Balaur Skin, 10x Hard Balaur Horn, 10x Hard Balaur Scale or 10x Boiling Balaur Blood Stain.\nDouble-click to receive a random item.

string.name: STR_Event_ADD_TITLE_277_30
string.body: [Event] [Title Card] Jack of All Trades (30 days)

string.name: STR_Event_ADD_TITLE_277_30_DESC
string.body: You can assume the title <Jack of All Trades>, increasing your Movement Speed by 4%%, your Flight Speed by 3%%, your Attack Speed by 3%% and your Casting Speed by 3%%.\nValid for 30 days.

string.name: STR_WRAP_WhiteDay_candybox_01_DESC

string.name: STR_EVENT_PETCARD_WhiteDay_R_FAIRYDEVILRED_01_DESC
string.body:
A Cutiepie egg.
In thanks for feeding him, he will give you an [Event] Finders Reward Chest.
Visit a Pet Minder to hatch this egg.
Follows you for 21 days.

string.name: STR_WRAP_CLASSIC_EVENT_MATTER_OPTION_60A_DESC

string.name: STR_EVENT_WHITEDAY_CANDY_DRINK_01_DESC
string.body: A bright and colourful piece of candy.\nBring several of them to Sugarnerk for a sweet reward.\nWhen used it increases [%e1.StatUp.StatName] by [%e1.StatUp.Value] and [%e2.StatUp.StatName] by [%e2.StatUp.Value] for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_wrap_event_pass_whitedaybox_02_DESC

string.name: STR_EVENT_ADD_TITLE279_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <Simply Sweet>, increasing your movement speed by 3%%, your flight speed by 3%%, your attack speed by 3%% and your casting speed by 3%%.\nCan be used for 15 days.
