string.name: STR_QUEST_80206_DESC
string.body: The markings are so faded, its difficult to tell exactly what it is, but it certainly seems to be from a previous era.\nCollectors are always on the lookout for such items.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_KISK_FORCE_MEDIUM_01_DESC
string.body: Upon opening, you receive an [Event] Alliance Kisk that matches your faction.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_IDPOGUSGAME_REWARD_02_DESC
string.body: Upon opening, you receive 1000x [Event] Noble Power Shard, 50x [Event] Stigma Shard, 2x [Event] Noble Recovery Serum, and 1x [Event] Jakunerks Large Scroll Bundle.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_IDPOGUSGAME_REWARD_03_DESC
string.body: Upon opening, you receive one of the following items: 3x [Event] Jakunerks Transformation Candy Box, 1x Manastone: Resist Magic +14, 1x [Event] Bundle of Alliance Kisks, 1x [Event] Tombstone of Revival, 100x [Event] Stigma Shards.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_IDLF1_ACCESSORY_01_DESC
string.body: Choose between a Physical and Magical Glorious Accessory Set.\nDouble-click or right-click to select the desired item.

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_IDLF1_ACCESSORY_01_A_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 Dragon Flame Diamond Necklace, 2 Earrings of Ascending, 2 Noahs Tears, 1 Brigade General Anuharts Leather Belt and 1 Black Cloud Wings (S401). \nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_IDLF1_ACCESSORY_01_B_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 Dragon Flame Sapphire Necklace, 2 Atmachs Earrings, 2 Elders Tears, 1 Brigade General Anuharts Sash and 1 Black Cloud Wings (S401). \nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_CANDY_ALL_STAR_01
string.body: All-Star Game Transformation Candy Selection Box

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_CANDY_ALL_STAR_01_DESC
string.body: Contains various Transformation Candy Packets to choose between.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_IDLF1_BEGINNER_01_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 Glorious Accessory Set Box, 1 Yasbas Grace, 1 Entry Scroll for Dark Poeta and 1 Time Activation Stone. \nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_CLASSIC_CASH_SCROLL_INIT_COOLT_IDLF1_01_DESC
string.body: Lets you re-enter the <Dark Poeta> instance.

string.name: STR_EVENT_HEAD_CLASSIC_GOLDMASK_01_DESC

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_500DAYS_TREASURE_01A_DESC

string.name: STR_EVENT_SCROLL_SHIELD_ALL_60A_DESC
string.body: Creates a shield that has a 100%% chance of absorbing [%e1.Shield.CoverValue] damage per attack and up to [%e1.Shield.ShieldValue] total damage.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_CANDY_DANDI_02_DESC
string.body: Contains 1 [Event] Swift Dandi Form Candy that matches your faction.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WRAP_EVENT_SCROLL_POTION_DANDI_01_DESC
string.body: Contains 20 [Event] Greater Courage Scrolls, 20 [Event] Greater Sprinting Scrolls, 20 [Event] Greater Awakening Scrolls, 20 [Event] Fine Anti-Shock Scrolls and 20 [Event] Greater Healing Potions.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_Event_SCROLL_INIT_COOLT_IDDF3_Dragon_Boss_01
string.body: [Event] Entry Scroll for the Draupnir Grotto

string.name: STR_Event_SCROLL_INIT_COOLT_IDDF3_Dragon_Boss_01_DESC
string.body: Lets you re-enter the <Draupnir Grotto> instance.

string.name: STR_WORLD_US_WRAP_CASH_BEGINNER_01_DESC
string.body: Upon opening, you receive a Novices Weapon Box, Novices Accessory Box, Novices Wings (30 days), Novices Shoes (30 days), Novices Title (15 days), pet inventory with 16 slots, and various scrolls to further your progression.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WORLD_US_WRAP_CASH_BEGINNER_01_SCROLL_INIT_COOLT
string.body: [Event] Entry Scrolls Box for the Instance

string.name: STR_WORLD_US_WRAP_CASH_BEGINNER_01_SCROLL_INIT_COOLT_DESC
string.body: Contains a box of Instance Entry Scrolls.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WORLD_US_WRAP_CASH_BEGINNER_01_SCROLL_01_DESC
string.body: Contains boxes of Greater Sprinting, Awakening, Courage, Raging Wind, Crit Strike, and Crit Spell Scrolls, as well as Instance Entry Scrolls.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WORLD_US_WRAP_CASH_BEGINNER_01_CONSUME_01_DESC
string.body: Contains Tombstone of Revival, Transformation Candy, Lesser Power Shard, Lodas Amulet III and Stigma Shard.\n Double-click to open.

string.name: STR_EVENT_CHARGING_SIEL_AURA_60_7DAY_DESC
string.body: Grants Siels Energy (Items) for 60 minutes. The charged Energy (Items) is only available to the character that used the corresponding item. Upon using Siels Energy (Ticket), double the amount of time is removed.\nYou can use this item for 7 days.

string.name: STR_ITEM_IDABRE_CORE_L_IN_DESC
string.body: A fragment allowing you to activate the space-time rift connected to the Abyssal Splinter.

string.name: STR_ITEM_IDABRE_CORE_D_IN_DESC
string.body: A fragment allowing you to activate the space-time rift connected to the Abyssal Splinter.

string.name: STR_Event_SCROLL_INIT_COOLT_ALL_SELECT_D_01_DESC
string.body: Lets you re-enter an instance of your choice from the list.

string.name: STR_CLASSIC_LUCKY_DICE_01_DESC

string.name: STR_EVENT_HEAD_CLASSIC_OVERALL_01_DESC
string.body: This hat with sunglasses makes romantic hearts beat even faster.

string.name: STR_EVENT_US__CELEBRATION_COIN_01_DESC
string.body: A coin to celebrate the anniversary.\nTake it to Passunerk to exchange it for another item.

string.name: STR_CLASSIC_US_EVENT_DROPBOOST_01_DESC
string.body: Your chance of obtaining dropped items while hunting is increased by 15%%.\nThe effect lasts for 1 hour. Cooldown takes 1 hour. Will not be doubled by other effects of this kind.

string.name: STR_EVENT_PETCARD_Springpicnic_Catwhite_USA_DESC
string.body:
An Adventurer Bomi egg.
In thanks for feeding him, he will give you an [Event] Spring Fruit Basket.
Visit a Pet Minder to hatch this egg.
Follows you for 14 days.

string.name: STR_KISK_LIGHT_FORCE_GLORY_DESC
string.body: Summons a Kisk which resurrects the fallen at its location. It lasts for 2 hours and can be activated by up to 24 Alliance members.\nOnly usable by members of the same alliance as the summoner.

string.name: STR_KISK_DARK_FORCE_GLORY_DESC
string.body: Summons a Kisk which resurrects the fallen at its location. It lasts for 2 hours and can be activated by up to 24 Alliance members.\nOnly usable by members of the same alliance as the summoner.

string.name: STR_KISK_LIGHT_LEGION_GLORY_DESC
string.body: Summons a Kisk which resurrects the fallen at its location. It lasts for 2 hours and can be activated by up to 48 Alliance members.\nOnly usable by members of the same legion as the summoner.

string.name: STR_KISK_DARK_LEGION_GLORY_DESC
string.body: Summons a Kisk which resurrects the fallen at its location. It lasts for 2 hours and can be activated by up to 48 Alliance members.\nOnly usable by members of the same legion as the summoner.

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_CANDY_HALLOWEEN_01_DESC

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_CANDY_HALLOWEEN_PUMKIN_01_DESC

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_CANDY_HALLOWEEN_VAMPIRE_01_DESC
string.body: Choose between 3 Transformation Candies for the Crazy, Smart and Mega Frankenshock/Vampirina. Male characters transform into Frankenshock, female characters into Vampirina.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_US_CASH_BEGINNER_CONSUME_02_DESC
string.body: Contains [Event] Tombstone of Revival, Transformation Candy: Charming Pink Tiger, [Event] Lodas Amulet III, [Event] Premium Power Shard Bundle (100 pieces), [Event] Stigma Shard and normal Stigma Chest (lv. 40-50).

string.name: STR_WORLD_CLASSIC_WELCOME_AUTUMN_COIN_01_DESC
string.body: A coin you obtained through the event pass. Passnerk will give you some quality items for it.\nThis item will disappear at the end of the event.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_US_EVENTPASS_EVENT_BATTERY_10_BOX_01
string.body: [Event] Lesser Power Shard Gift Box (200 pieces)

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_US_EVENTPASS_MATTER_ENCHANT_RANDOMBOX_01_DESC
string.body: Contains a random level 91-100 Enchantment Stone.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_US_EVENTPASS_MATTER_PROC_BOX_DESC
string.body: You obtained this box by exchanging event pass coins.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WORLD_NCT_EVENT_ADD_TITLE_293_30DAY_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <Strong Atreian>, increasing your movement speed by +5%%, your attack speed by +1%% and your casting speed by +1%%.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_STAFF_CHAGESKIN_02A_DESC
string.body: A staff shaped like a Yule staff.\nUsed to modify a weapons appearance. Can be obtained from the Equipment Appearance Modifier in Sanctum and Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_SWORD_CHAGESKIN_02A_DESC
string.body: A longsword shaped like a sugary lolly.\nUsed to modify a weapons appearance. Can be obtained from the Equipment Appearance Modifier in Sanctum and Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_BOOK_CHAGESKIN_02A_DESC
string.body: A magic tome that looks like a greetings card.\nUsed to modify a weapons appearance. Can be obtained from the Equipment Appearance Modifier in Sanctum and Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_BOW_CHAGESKIN_02A_DESC
string.body: A bow shaped like a festive coat hanger.\nUsed to modify a weapons appearance. Can be obtained from the Equipment Appearance Modifier in Sanctum and Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_POLEARM_CHAGESKIN_02A_DESC
string.body: A polearm shaped like a twinkling polar star.\nUsed to modify a weapons appearance. Can be obtained from the Equipment Appearance Modifier in Sanctum and Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_MACE_CHAGESKIN_02A_DESC
string.body: A mace shaped like a ringing bell.\nUsed to modify a weapons appearance. Can be obtained from the Equipment Appearance Modifier in Sanctum and Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_2HSWORD_CHAGESKIN_02A_DESC
string.body: A two-handed sword shaped like a Solorius Tree.\nUsed to modify a weapons appearance. Can be obtained from the Equipment Appearance Modifier in Sanctum and Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_ORB_CHAGESKIN_02A_DESC
string.body: An orb shaped like a festive wreath.\nUsed to modify a weapons appearance. Can be obtained from the Equipment Appearance Modifier in Sanctum and Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_SHIELD_CHAGESKIN_02A_DESC
string.body: A shield with a unique appearance.\nUsed to modify a weapons appearance.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_DAGGER_CHAGESKIN_02A_DESC
string.body: A dagger with a unique appearance.\nUsed to modify a weapons appearance.

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_WEAPON_PACKAGE_01_DESC
string.body: Choose 1 Crucible Masters weapon from the contents.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_ARMOR_SET_01_DESC

string.name: STR_WRAP_CASH_ARMOR_SET_02_DESC

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_Petcard_MULTY_GRIFFOPINK_30DAY_DESC
string.body:
The egg of a Pink Griffo.
Automatically consumes meals and scrolls.
Visit a Pet Minder to hatch this egg. 
This pet accompanies you for 30 days.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_SCROLL_IDF4RE_DRANA_PIECE_SELECT_BOX
string.body: [Event] Esoterrace Instance Entry Scroll Piece Selection Box

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_SCROLL_IDF4RE_DRANA_PIECE_SELECT_BOX_DESC
string.body: Open to select one of the following items: [Event] 1st Entry Scroll Piece (Esoterrace), [Event] 2nd Entry Scroll Piece (Esoterrace), [Event] 3rd Entry Scroll Piece (Esoterrace) or [Event] 4th Entry Scroll Piece (Esoterrace).\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_US_DEVAPASS_S18_SOCIAL_SIGN_DESC
string.body: Open to receive [Emotion Card] Flag O and [Emotion Card] Flag X.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_US_DEVAPASS_S18_FINAL_DESC
string.body: Open to receive a Dating Outfit and Date Hair Accessory.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_CLASSIC_US_THANKSGIVING_COIN_01_DESC
string.body: A coin you obtained through the event pass. Borminerk will give you some quality items for it.\nThis item will disappear at the end of the event.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_MYSTERY_REWARDBOX_JP_DESC
string.body: Contains a variety of items.\nDouble-click to open and receive a random item from its contents.

string.name: STR_WORLD_JP_EVENT_ADD_TITLE_301_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <Master Sleuth>, increasing your accuracy by +7 and your magical accuracy by +7.\nCan be used for 7 days.

string.name: STR_WORLD_JP_EVENT_ADD_TITLE_302_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <Master Sleuth>, increasing your accuracy by +7 and your magical accuracy by +7.\nCan be used for 15 days.

string.name: STR_WORLD_JP_EVENT_ADD_TITLE_303_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <Master Sleuth>, increasing your accuracy by +7 and your magical accuracy by +7.\nCan be used for 30 days.

string.name: STR_WORLD_JP_EVENT_ADD_TITLE_304_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <Gangster>, increasing your evasion by +4 and your resist magic by +4.\nCan be used for 7 days.

string.name: STR_WORLD_JP_EVENT_ADD_TITLE_305_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <Gangster>, increasing your evasion by +4 and your resist magic by +4.\nCan be used for 15 days.

string.name: STR_WORLD_JP_EVENT_ADD_TITLE_306_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <Gangster>, increasing your evasion by +4 and your resist magic by +4.\nCan be used for 30 days.

string.name: STR_WRAP_JP_CASH_BOX_LEVELUP_COIN_02_DESC
string.body: Contains either 150 Gold Coins, 100 Platinum Coins or 50 Mithril Coins. It also contains 500 [Event] Fine Recovery Potions, 10 [Event] Major Divine Mana Serums and 10 [Event] Major Divine Life Serums.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_US_THANKSGIVING_MATTER_ENCHANT_RANDOMBOX_01
string.body: [Event] Harvest Revel Random Enchantment Stone Box (Level 91-100)

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_US_THANKSGIVING_MATTER_ENCHANT_RANDOMBOX_01_DESC
string.body: Contains a random level 91-100 Enchantment Stone.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_US_THANKSGIVING_MEDAL_RANDOMBOX_01_DESC
string.body: Contains a Silver Medal, Gold Medal or Azure Gold Medal at random.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_DAVANION_COUPON_ARMORBOX_55A_02_DESC
string.body: Upon opening, you receive a Gravitas Armour Box that matches your faction.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_WEAPONBOX_N_E1_A_55A_DESC
string.body: Select a one of Yamennes weapons from the contents.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_ACCESSORYBOX_A_U2_55_DESC
string.body: Select a Primus Pilus belt chest, ring chest, necklace chest or hair jewellery chest from the contents.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_YEAR_END_GIFT_DESC
string.body: Upon opening, you receive one of many different items.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WORLD_EVENT_TICKET_EXCHANGE_WEAPON_N_E1_55A_DESC
string.body: The item expands Stormwings weapon slots by 6.\nWeapon enchantment levels and manastones will be reset.

string.name: STR_WORLD_CN_EVENT_ADD_TITLE_307_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <First Victor>, increasing your attack speed by +1%% and your casting speed by +1%%.

string.name: STR_WORLD_CN_EVENT_ADD_TITLE_308_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <Second Victor>, increasing your attack speed by +1%% and your casting speed by +1%%.

string.name: STR_WORLD_CN_EVENT_ADD_TITLE_309_DESC
string.body: Bestows the title <Third Victor>, increasing your attack speed by +1%% and your casting speed by +1%%.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_SCROLL_INIT_COOLT_ALL_SELECT_DESC
string.body: Contains an [Event] Instance Entry Selection Scroll.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_SCROLL_INIT_COOLT_IDDREADGION_02_01
string.body: [Event] Entry Scroll Bundle for the Chantra Dredgion

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_FEED_DRAGONZMEYGREEN_PET_01
string.body: [Event] Box of Dwarf Acarun Snacks (30 pieces)

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_SCROLL_INIT_COOLT_IDDREADGION_02_01_DESC
string.body: Contains an [Event] Entry Scroll for the Chantra Dredgion.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_OPTION_R_SELECT_02_DESC
string.body: Contains various event manastones.\nDouble-click to select.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_US_EVENTPASS_MEDAL_06_DESC
string.body: Contains Azure Gold Medals.\nDouble-click to open.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_US_BALAUR_MATERIAL_BOX_01_DESC
string.body: You receive 10 Balaur materials of the same type at random.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_US_EVENTPASS_SCROLL_INIT_COOLT_L_01_DESC
string.body: Upon opening, you can select an Entry Scroll for Dark Poeta, Theobomos Lab, Draupnir Cave or Steel Rake.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_US_EVENTPASS_SCROLL_INIT_COOLT_D_01_DESC
string.body: Upon opening, you can select an Entry Scroll for Dark Poeta, Adma Stronghold, Draupnir Cave or Steel Rake.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_US_EVENT_PASS_TREASURE_02A_01_DESC
string.body: Open to receive 2 Greater Ancient Crowns.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_CHANGESKIN_SEA_BOX_01_DESC
string.body: You receive the Ocean Tunic, Ocean Cloth Shoulderpads, Ocean Cloth Breeches, Ocean Cloth Gloves and Ocean Cloth Shoes.

string.name: STR_WRAP_JP_PEARL_BOX_2022_01_DESC
string.body: Contains a variety of items.\nDouble-click to open and receive a random item from its contents.

string.name: STR_WORLD_CLASSIC_US_WINTER_COIN_01_DESC

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_US_WINTER_EVENTPASS_MATTER_ENCHANT_RANDOMBOX_01

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_US_WINTER_EVENTPASS_MATTER_PROC_BOX_DESC

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_US_WINTER_EVENTPASS_MATTER_ENCHANT_RANDOMBOX_01_DESC
